about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Learn about my journey
about.bio1: Experienced Data Scientist with a proven track record of 4 years in Natural Language Processing (NLP) and 5 years in time series forecasting. Proficient in cutting-edge NLP technologies including LlamaIndex, RAG, data augmentation, LangChain, and others.
about.bio2: Skilled in Python libraries such as NumPy, Pandas, Scikit-learn (Sklearn), Matplotlib, and PyTorch. Experienced in network analysis using Gephi and Python libraries like Networkx and Py3plex. Possesses a robust mathematical background in deep learning and a keen interest in pioneering new technologies within this domain.
about.name: Name

0.title: Data Analysis

1.title: Machine Learning
1.description: Building predictive models using supervised and unsupervised learning techniques to solve business problems.

2.title: NLP & Text Analytics
2.description: Specialized in natural language processing for text classification, sentiment analysis, and information extraction.

3.title: Time Series Forecasting
3.description: Developing models to predict future values based on previously observed values with high accuracy.

4.title: Data Visualization
4.description: Creating insightful visual representations of data to communicate results effectively to stakeholders.

5.title: Deep Learning
5.description: Implementing neural networks for complex pattern recognition tasks in various domains.

items.description: Focus on algorithms, data structures, and foundations of computing with specialization in data analysis.
Studied advanced mathematics, statistics, and programming with honors in data science applications.
Specialized in machine learning and artificial intelligence with research in natural language processing.
Started career analyzing business data and creating reports to support decision-making processes.
Developed machine learning models for customer segmentation and predictive analytics.
Leading NLP projects including sentiment analysis and intent recognition for voice assistants.
